AnswerText: It is to work and the abdomen?
To help make the strangulating sound.
Another function is to strangulate or make noises.
Another function of the elytra is to fly.
Another function for elytra is abdomen.
The elytra flies. It makes a sound.
When the Bess beetles are crawling in the wood they need something hard to protect itself.
For protecting inner parts while going through small areas.
Another function is to protect the abdomen.
The elytra also protects the Bess beetle if it falls on its back.
The elytra makes sounds. Example danger, Example did you have a good day.
Another function of the elytra is for strangulating.
The beetle can rub its elytra making noises in order to communicate.
